      • getSelectedTiffFile

        public static void getSelectedTiffFile(java.io.File tiffFile,
                       int pageLimit)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        The getSelectedTiffFile method is used to limit the file to the page limit given.
        Parameters:
        tiffFile - File tiff file from which limit has to be applied
        pageLimit - page limit
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file is not found

      • getImageDimensions

        public static int[] getImageDimensions(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Gets the image file dimensions. Currently only tiff, tif and png images are allowed.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - String absolute image file path
        Returns:
        returns the image dimension as an array, with width being the fist element and height second. If error occurs while getting the dimensions, null is returned.
        Throws:
        Throws - UnsupportedOperationException if any other file type other than tif, tiff and png files are passed.
